mapper.select: SELECT M.MESSAGE_NUM, M.MESSAGE_CONTENTS, M.SEND_DATE, M.MESSAGE_TITLE, MC.MESSAGECHECK_NUM, MC.CHECK_STATUS, MC.MESSAGE_STATUS, MC.SENDER_DELETE, U.NAME, DP.DEPT_NAME FROM MESSAGE M JOIN MESSAGE_CHECK MC ON M.MESSAGE_NUM = MC.MESSAGE_NUM JOIN USERS U ON MC.USER_ID = U.USER_ID JOIN DEPARTMENT DP ON DP.DEPT_ID = U.DEPT_ID WHERE M.SENDER = #{userId}

SELECT M.MESSAGE_NUM,M.SENDER, M.MESSAGE_CONTENTS, M.SEND_DATE, M.MESSAGE_TITLE, MC.CHECK_STATUS, MC.MESSAGE_STATUS, U.NAME, DP.DEPT_NAME FROM MESSAGE M JOIN MESSAGE_CHECK MC ON M.MESSAGE_NUM = MC.MESSAGE_NUM JOIN USERS U ON U.USER_ID = M.SENDER JOIN DEPARTMENT DP ON DP.DEPT_ID = U.DEPT_ID WHERE MC.USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSAGE(MESSAGE_NUM, MESSAGE_CONTENTS, SEND_DATE, MESSAGE_TITLE, SENDER) VALUES(NULL, #{messageContents}, NOW(), #{messageTitle}, #{sender})
INSERT INTO MESSAGE_CHECK(MESSAGECHECK_NUM, MESSAGE_NUM, CHECK_STATUS, MESSAGE_STATUS, USER_ID, RECEIVER_DELETE, SENDER_DELETE) VALUES(NULL, #{messageNum}, 0, #{kind}, #{userId}, 0 , 0)
